# kIOUserAudioObjectIDDriver

**Global Variable**

The audio object ID of the driver.

## Declaration

```swift
constexpr const IOUserAudioObjectID kIOUserAudioObjectIDDriver;
```

## Discussion

This [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioObjectID] always refers to the one and only instance of the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDriver].
title: kIOUserAudioObjectIDDriver
